mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CS.NAME AS SUPPLIER_NAME,CASE WHEN ISCD.SALE_CHANGE_NO IS NOT NULL AND ISCE.CHANGE_TYPE=3 THEN '改签' ELSE '出票' END AS CHANGE_TYPE,ISOE.ISSUE_TIME AS TICKET_DATE,ISOE.SALE_ORDER_NO AS SALE_ORDER_NO,ISOD.TICKET_NO AS TICKET_NO, CONCAT(IL.DEP_AIRPORT,'-',IL.ARR_AIRPORT) AS ROUTING,IL.FLIGHT_NO AS FLIGHT_NO,IL.CABIN AS CABIN,IL.DEP_TIME AS DEP_DATE, 1 AS TICKET_NUM,ISOE.EXCHANGE_RATE AS RATE,IP.SALE_FARE AS TRUE_PRICE,IP.SALE_PRICE AS SETTLE_PRICE,IP.SALE_TAX AS TAX, IP.SALE_PRICE AS TOTAL_PRICE,IP.SALE_PRICE-IP.BUY_PRICE-IP.BUY_TAX AS GROSS,ISOE.CREATOR AS SALE_PERSON,SD.NAME AS SALE_DEPT, SMD.NAME AS MONTH_SETTLE, SOI.NAME AS COMPANY,CONCAT(IP.SURNAME,'/',IP.NAME) AS PASSENGER_NAME,CASE WHEN IP.GENDER=1 THEN '男' ELSE '女' END AS GENDER, CC.BUSINESS_LINE AS SOURCE,ISOE.SALE_REMARK AS REMARK,ISOE.MODIFIER AS TICKET_PERSON FROM IFT_SALE_ORDER_EXT ISOE LEFT JOIN OS_SALEORDER OS ON OS.SALE_ORDER_NO=ISOE.SALE_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN IFT_SALE_ORDER_DETAIL ISOD ON ISOD.SALE_ORDER_NO=ISOE.SALE_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CPS_CUSTOMER CC ON CC.CUSTOMER_NO=OS.CUSTOMER_NO LEFT JOIN OS_BUYORDER OB ON OB.SALE_ORDER_NO=OS.SALE_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN IFT_BUY_ORDER_EXT IBOE ON IBOE.BUY_ORDER_NO=OB.BUY_ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN CPS_SUPPLIER CS ON CS.SUPPLIER_NO=IBOE.SUPPLIER_NO LEFT JOIN IFT_PASSENGER IP ON IP.PASSENGER_NO=ISOD.PASSENGER_NO LEFT JOIN IFT_LEG IL ON IL.LEG_NO=ISOD.LEG_NO LEFT JOIN SM_OWNER_INFO SOI ON SOI.OWNER=ISOE.OWNER LEFT JOIN GBC_DEOTCTYPE GD ON GD.CTYPE_NO=CC.GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN SM_DEPT SD ON SD.ID=GD.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SM_DICT SMD ON SMD.CODE=CC.BALANCE_CORPORATION LEFT JOIN IFT_SALE_CHANGE_DETAIL ISCD ON ISCD.SALE_ORDER_DETAIL_NO=ISOD.SALE_ORDER_DETAIL_NO LEFT JOIN IFT_SALE_CHANGE_EXT ISCE ON ISCE.SALE_CHANGE_NO=ISCD.SALE_CHANGE_NO WHERE GD.PTYPE=2
